description_for_human: Track and manage job applications. Add, update,delete and view job applications.
description_for_model: Manage job applications by adding, updating, deleting and viewing them. You can add, update, delete, and view them. The following categories will be extracted from the job description: company name, job title, date of application, contact person, status, and notes. Each row will be saved to the CSV file and the results will be displayed in a table. If some categories aren't provided, let the user know
